text:
The Lega Nord (English: "Northern League") is an Italian political party. It's leader is Matteo Salvini.
After the 2018 elections, Lega Nord formed a coalition with the Five Star Movement.
Since 2014, the party has been a member of the Right-wing to far-right Movement for a Europe of Nations and Freedom group in the European Parliament.

annotations.surface_form: Movement for a Europe of Nations and Freedom
